name: Enlightenment (itch) (XenosNS)
description:
Use the ancient knowledge to find your way out of the darkness.

Made for Ludum Dare 38, "Small World."
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/$25278

5 short levels. Use arrows to move.

Note: HTML5 is best played in Chrome. HTML5 version has a bug that prevents some effects. Try the windows exe to see them.

Tools used:
GameMaker:Studio
ChipTone (SFB Games)
WolframTones

Thanks Robert Butler, Dylan Fries, "Executive Producer" Matthew Keeping
